name: X-Design 2.0
tagline: Your creative AI agent for generating branded assets
description: Create logos, brand kits, and guidelines in minutes with an AI agent that generates concepts, refines visuals, and exports editable assets (JPG, SVG, PNG). Built for founders, freelancers, and teams who need fast iterations, consistent output, and brand systems ready for both online and real-world use.

name: Stickerbox
tagline: Kid-safe, AI-powered voice-to-sticker printer
description: The first voice-powered, AI creative tool that instantly transforms any idea into a sticker that you can color, share and collect! Kids say “a ghost riding a skateboard” and a few seconds later they are holding that ghost as a real sticker. It turns kid's wild ideas into physical art they can color, stick, and share with friends.

name: ZapDigits
tagline: Quickly build client-ready marketing dashboards
description: ZapDigits is the all-in-one marketing dashboard built for Agencies, Startups, and founders. Connect your Meta Ads, Google Ads, GA4, Search Console, CallRail, Google Sheets, and 20+ other tools with a single click, and instantly see all your data in real time. No more scattered spreadsheets, last-minute reporting. ZapDigits brings all your marketing metrics together in one place. Share interactive dashboards with your team or clients, track tasks, and make smarter decisions faster.

name: Once UI 1.5
tagline: Open-source designs for interactive + animated interactions
description: Once UI 1.5 is about bringing wonder back to UI engineering. We’re introducing new visual effects — weather, particles, matrix-style dots — all drop-in and usable in just a few lines of code. You also get a new generation of chart types built for live data and real-time dashboards. Only in Once UI. A toolkit for indie builders who want their product to feel alive, expressive, and unmistakably theirs.

name: Runway Gen-4.5
tagline: A new frontier for video generation
description: Runway Gen-4.5 is the new top-rated video model (1,247 Elo). It delivers SOTA motion quality, precise prompt adherence, and realistic physics—without sacrificing speed.

name: Hyvor Post
tagline: Simple, privacy-first newsletter platform
description: Hyvor Post is a simple, privacy-first newsletter platform. No Tracking. Just Ideas, Delivered.

name: DeepSeek-V3.2
tagline: Reasoning-first models built for agents
description: We’re on a journey to advance and democratize artificial intelligence through open source and open science.

name: Vibecode DB
tagline: The Frontend Database API Gateway
description: vibecode-db rethinks how frontend apps talk to the backend. Define your schema once and query any backend - SQLite, Supabase, PostgreSQL, REST APIs — using one unified, type-safe interface. No rewrites, no SDK switching, no lock-in. Swap databases anytime, build offline-first apps, and integrate any backend through CustomAdapter. Write once. Use anywhere.

name: Shipper Advisor
tagline: Build apps with AI - now with an AI cofounder by your side
description: The AI we always wanted: builds complete apps from 1 prompt, always knows how to improve them, and switches between 'expert developer' and 'professional marketer' depending on what you need.

name: Buglet
tagline: Turn customer frustration into actionable feedback
description: Buglet is a lightweight, no-code widget for capturing visual bug reports directly from your users. Fast setup, clear feedback, happier customers.

name: FocusRoom
tagline: Turn your tasks into calming space missions
description: FocusRoom is a calming, ADHD-friendly focus app that turns your work into guided space missions. Instead of overwhelming to-do lists, you choose one task and enter a distraction-free “focus universe.” Stay consistent, reduce burnout, track your progress, and build real focus habits with immersive missions, task management, streaks, and soothing space ambience.

name: Clipse
tagline: Synchronized calendar availability across timezones
description: Clipse gives you a scheduling link that does something unique: visitors can sync their calendar with yours to see true mutual availability. But it doesn't stop there. If the other meeting guests are also Clipse users, your scheduling page will synchronize EVERYONE'S availability to display days and times that work for the whole group. Our free Individual tier gives you the full experience so you can try it risk free.

name: Markdown Studio
tagline: Markdown editor built for the AI workflow era
description: Markdown Studio is a free editor designed for the AI workflow era — draft prompts, format context, and prep content for ChatGPT, Claude, and other LLMs. ✓ Real-time token counting across GPT-4, Claude & more ✓ Live preview that syncs with your cursor ✓ Auto-save version history every 5 minutes ✓ Smart copy optimized for AI chats ✓ Dark mode, multi-tab, PDF/HTML export 100% private. No accounts. No tracking. Your data never leaves your browser. Completely free.

name: Cleva.io
tagline: Conversational AI guidance inside your creative tools.
description: Most AI tools try to create for you — Cleva teaches you to create. It’s an in-app, voice-based coach that helps you learn Figma, Photoshop, After Effects, Blender and more while you work. Ask anything, anytime. Cleva understands your screen, guides you step-by-step, and gives short interactive modules instead of long tutorials. A personal tutor for the tools you use every day.

name: SimCockpit
tagline: Xcode Simulator Supercharged
description: SimCockpit is the native control center for your Xcode Simulator. We built it to replace the friction of terminal commands and scattered tools with a single floating window. Toggle network conditions, mock GPS locations, edit User Defaults, and record demos without breaking your flow. It is the missing companion designed to let you focus on building great apps, not managing your environment.

name: Aikido Attack
tagline: Get a pentest done, today.
description: AI-powered penetration testing that delivers same-day results. Deploy autonomous agents that discover, exploit, and validate vulnerabilities across your entire attack surface. Full audit-grade reports in hours. Unlimited retests included. Security moves at the speed of development, not procurement.

name: AroCrypt v0.10.0
tagline: Now with KYBER quantum safe keys + AES CTR encryption
description: AroCrypt v0.10.0 delivers major upgrades with KYBER quantum safe key sharing, new AES GCM and AES CTR encryption families, a cleaner configuration center, standalone file encryption, improved visuals, Windows context menu actions, operation history, and multiple stability fixes. Faster, safer, and more modern than ever.

name: FoodGram（Android）
tagline: Find & share restaurants by real meal photos
description: FoodGram is a photo-driven food SNS that helps you discover delicious meals through real user photos—no scores or ads, just honest impressions. Browse visually and choose what you truly want to eat. Explore a global food map built from posts across 15 countries, including Japan. Whether you're finding nearby spots, planning travel eats, or saving home-cooked dishes, FoodGram makes discovery fun. Create your own food album, post anonymously, or just enjoy scrolling through tasty photos worldwide.

name: InfiniChat AI
tagline: Unlimited AI Chat Assistant, Blazing-fast & Private
description: Break Free from Expensive AI Chat Limits! Experience unlimited AI conversations without expensive plans or message limits. Your personal AI assistant is always available with InfiniChat AI.

name: DeepSeek V3.2
tagline: Open-Source LLM matching GPT-5
description: DeepSeek V3.2 and V3.2-Speciale are breakthrough open-source AI models from China, built to rival top closed models like OpenAI’s GPT-5 and Google Gemini 3 Pro. Delivering gold-level results in both math and programming benchmarks, DeepSeek V3.2-Speciale even outperforms GPT-5 on AIME 2025. With efficient architecture and exceptional reasoning abilities, these models are perfect for both enthusiasts and enterprise applications
